pullrequest.title: Wrap visual studio pragmas in ifdef's (#20)

content.raw:
Probably you already know but _MSC_VER refers to Visual Studio, while _WIN32 is about Windows, in the sense that there are other compilers that work on Windows. We should review what refers explicitly to the Windows API (_WIN32), and what to Visual Studio.

In this case, `_MSC_VER` is the good one to use. We should probably change some others.
